formattedAddress: 153 W 80th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 153 W 80th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: I recently had a photo shoot with Florence to take professional photos for business use. I had such a wonderful experience from start to finish! Aside from being a very gifted photographer, Florence has a great gift in relaxing you while you are shooting with her. She made me feel so relaxed and at home in the studio space- not an altogether easy task when being in front of the camera! We had so much fun during the shoot, and we took some really creative and unusual shots. The results were very high quality and creative photos, which I am so excited to use. I would definitely work with Florence in the future (and hope to do so!) and I would highly recommend her services.

originalText.text:
Last week I had the pleasure of working with photographer Florence Montmare. I had been looking for a photographer for my new album and when I saw Florence's work, I got so excited!

Florence is an amazingly talented artist and takes breathtaking and gorgeous photographs. Working with her was such a great experience. She had so many wonderful ideas for my shoot and really listened to what I wanted as we explored possibilities together. She's a good communicator, both efficient and also very warm at the same time. I felt confident about our plan going into the day of the shoot and things just got better from there.

We did our shoot outside, and Florence was totally focused and at the same time very spontaneous. It felt like true collaboration and we worked really well together. She has a wonderful way of finding shots and recognizing "moments", conveying pose suggestions and complimenting her subject to bring out the best in every shot. I felt very free and open and in great hands. Florence has really positive, engaged energy and everyone on the shoot came together as a team with her leadership.

Working with Florence was super magical and even more special than I imagined! It's rare to find someone who has such extraordinary abilities both photographically and personally. I highly recommend working with her!

originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience working with Florence when she did my headshots. She knows how to put you at ease, is fun to work with, pays great attention to details and is a great listener. I would recommend her in a heartbeat!

text.text: I had a wonderful experience working with Florence when she did my headshots. She knows how to put you at ease, is fun to work with, pays great attention to details and is a great listener. I would recommend her in a heartbeat!

originalText.text:
Florence is awesome! Her disposition and engaging personality is truly infectious and really drew us in. In addition, the body of work she presented was truly amazing and this is was what convinced us that she was the right person to capture our occasion. The day of the event, she was the consummate professional and captured the day much better than we could have ever dreamed!

Florence is a gifted photographer with a very unique aesthetic. Her eye for the smallest detail and intrigue with capturing the most interesting, nontraditional poses and movements is genius! We were extremely impressed with the photos she captured of our occasion, and thank her beyond words for such excellent work. Her work speaks for itself. Her creativity in combination with her professionalism, personality and preparedness, makes her perhaps one of the best photographers around!

originalText.text: Florence is an artist and when you shoot with her you are creating art with her.  We had a specific plan regarding the shots we were going for and we accomplished that plan but also so much more!  Florence's keen awareness and free imagination allowed for us to improvise and capture lots of moments that someone stuck on an agenda might miss.  I felt that Florence captured my essence in her photos which I always hope for in a session and we had so much fun.  I'm looking forward to shooting with her again.
